title: Microsoft says Office bug exposed customers’ confidential emails to Copilot AI
summary: Microsoft said the bug meant that its Copilot AI chatbot was reading and summarizing paying customers' confidential emails, bypassing data protection policies.

title: OpenAI pushes into higher education as India seeks to scale AI skills
summary: OpenAI says its India education partnerships aim to reach more than 100,000 students, faculty and staff over the next year.

title: Canva gets to $4B in revenue as LLM referral traffic rises
summary: The creative company's monthly active users increased 20%, growth that was partially propelled by adoption of its AI tools.

title: World Labs lands $200M from Autodesk to bring world models into 3D workflows
summary: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a focus on entertainment use cases.

title: India’s Sarvam wants to bring its AI models to feature phones, cars and smart glasses
summary: The company is using edge models that take up only megabytes of space, can run on most phones with existing processors, and can work offline.

title: Heron Power raises $140M to ramp production of grid-altering tech
summary: Tesla alumni Drew Baglino raises a large round to build a giga-scale factory, this time at his own startup.

title: Indian AI lab Sarvam’s new models are a major bet on the viability of open-source AI
summary: The new lineup includes 30-billion and 105-billion parameter models; a text-to-speech model; a speech-to-text model; and a vision model to parse documents.

title: DG Matrix raises $60M to make data center power smarter
summary: The startup is making solid-state transformers capable of intelligently aggregating power from a number of different sources before sending it to data center racks.

title: U.S. court bars OpenAI from using ‘Cameo’
summary: OpenAI has renamed its feature in Sora from "Cameo" to "Characters."

title: Tesla dodges 30-day suspension in California after removing ‘Autopilot’
summary: The decision comes a month after Tesla discontinued Autopilot, its basic driver-assistance system.

title: Intellexa’s Predator spyware used to hack iPhone of journalist in Angola, research says
summary: Amnesty International says it found evidence that a government customer of Intellexa, a sanctioned surveillance vendor, used its Predator spyware against a prominent journalist in Angola.

title: Jack Altman joins Benchmark as GP
summary: Jack Altman and Benchmark announced today that he would be joining the firm as a general partner.

title: Ford turns to F1 and bounties to build a $30,000 electric truck
summary: A combination of 3D-printed Lego-like parts, Formula 1 thinking, and a bounty program will help the company hit that target. The team, led by Tesla veteran Alan Clarke, is obsessed with efficiency.

title: Meta’s own research found parental supervision doesn’t really help curb teens’ compulsive social media use
summary: An internal research study at Meta found that parental supervision may not help teens regulate their social media, and teens with trauma are more inclined to overuse social media.

summary: As the AI hardware space heats up, the iPhone maker has multiple smart products in development.

title: Thrive raises $10B for new fund, its largest yet
summary: Thrive Capital just raised $10 billion for its new fund -- nearly double the size of its last fund.

title: Climactic launches hybrid fund to get startups through the ‘valley of death’

title: Perplexity joins anti-ad camp as AI companies battle over trust and revenue

title: Tesla won’t use the term ‘Autopilot’ in California anymore
